mapper.select: select * from tblCard where type = 1 and category = #{category}
select a.card_annual_fee_seq, b.annual_fee_no, b.brand, b.annual_fee, a.card_seq from tblCardAnnualFee a inner join tblAnnualFee b on b.annual_fee_no = a.annual_fee_no where card_seq = #{seq}
select * from (select * from tblCard where type = 1 order by card_seq desc) where rownum <= 3
select * from tblCard where card_seq = #{seq}
select * from tblCard where type = 2 and category = #{category}

select a.benefits_no, a.type, a.subject, a.content, a.rate, a.limit, a.prev_month_perf, a.img, b.card_benefit_seq, b.card_seq from tblBenefits a inner join tblCardBenefit b on a.benefits_no = b.benefits_no where b.card_seq = #{seq}
select * from tblCard where name like '%' || #{word} || '%'

select a.member_seq, (select name from tblMember where member_seq = a.member_seq) as name, a.member_card_seq, a.card_no, a.card_seq, b.member_card_history_seq, b.transaction_date, b.amount, b.installment_months from tblMemberCard a inner join tblMemberCardHistory b on a.member_card_seq = b.member_card_seq where 1=1 and b.member_card_history_seq not in (select member_card_history_seq from tblPayment) and member_seq = #{memberSeq} and to_char(transaction_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm')

select * from( select b.member_seq, a.member_card_history_seq, a.member_card_seq, to_char(a.transaction_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as transaction_date, a.name, a.amount, a.installment_months, (select name from tblCard where card_seq = b.card_seq) as card_name from tblMemberCardHistory a inner join tblMemberCard b on b.member_card_seq = a.member_card_seq where member_seq = 2 order by transaction_date desc) where rownum <= 5
SELECT count(*) FROM tblMemberCard WHERE 1=1 and member_seq = #{memberSeq} and substr(card_no, length(card_no)-3) = #{cardNo} and substr(password, 0, 2) = #{pw}

select a.member_card_seq, a.member_seq, SUBSTR(a.card_no, 1, 4) || '-' || RPAD('*', 4, '*') || '-' || RPAD('*', 4, '*') || '-' || SUBSTR(a.card_no, 13) AS card_no, a.card_seq, a.exp, a.password, (select name from tblCard where card_seq = a.card_seq) as name from tblMemberCard a where member_seq = #{seq} order by a.member_card_seq desc

select a.member_card_history_seq, b.member_seq, b.member_card_seq, b.card_seq, (select name from tblCard where card_seq = b.card_seq) as card_name, to_char(a.transaction_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as transaction_date, a.name, a.amount, a.installment_months from tblMemberCardHistory a inner join tblmembercard b on b.member_card_seq = a.member_card_seq where to_char(transaction_date, 'yyyymm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'yyyymm') and b.member_seq = #{seq} and a.member_card_history_seq not in (select member_card_history_seq from tblPayment where member_card_history_seq = a.member_card_history_seq) order by a.transaction_date asc

SELECT sum(amount) as sum FROM tblMemberCardHistory a INNER JOIN tblMemberCard b ON b.member_card_seq = a.member_card_seq WHERE 1=1 and to_char(transaction_date, 'yyyymm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'yyyymm') and b.member_seq = #{seq} and a.member_card_history_seq not in (select member_card_history_seq from tblPayment where member_card_history_seq = a.member_card_history_seq)

SELECT a.member_card_history_seq FROM tblMemberCardHistory a INNER JOIN tblMemberCard b ON b.member_card_seq = a.member_card_seq WHERE 1=1 and to_char(transaction_date, 'yyyymm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, -1), 'yyyymm') and b.member_seq = #{seq} and a.member_card_history_seq not in (select member_card_history_seq from tblPayment where member_card_history_seq = a.member_card_history_seq)
SELECT amount FROM tblMemberCardHistory WHERE member_card_history_seq = #{memberCardHistorySeq}

select a.member_card_history_seq, b.member_seq, b.member_card_seq, b.card_seq, (select name from tblCard where card_seq = b.card_seq) as card_name, to_char(a.transaction_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as transaction_date, a.name, a.amount from tblMemberCardHistory a inner join tblmembercard b on b.member_card_seq = a.member_card_seq where a.member_card_history_seq = #{memberCardHistorySeq}
select balance from tblBankBook where bank_book_seq = ( select distinct bank_book_seq from tblMemberCard where member_seq = #{memberSeq})
select amount from tblMemberCardHistory where member_card_history_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into tblPayment (payment_seq, member_card_history_seq, payment_date, amount) values (payment_seq.nextVal, #{memberCardHistorySeq}, TO_DATE(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{amount})
mapper.update: update tblBankBook set balance = balance - #{amount} where bank_book_seq = ( select distinct bank_book_seq from tblMemberCard where member_seq = #{memberSeq})
mapper.select: select account_number from tblBankBook where bank_book_seq = ( select distinct bank_book_seq from tblMemberCard where member_seq = #{memberSeq})

select a.member_card_history_seq, b.member_seq, b.member_card_seq, b.card_seq, (select name from tblCard where card_seq = b.card_seq) as card_name, to_char(a.transaction_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as transaction_date, a.name, a.amount, a.installment_months from tblMemberCardHistory a inner join tblmembercard b on b.member_card_seq = a.member_card_seq where b.member_seq = #{seq} order by a.transaction_date desc
SELECT name FROM tblCard WHERE name like '%' || #{value} || '%'
